Package com.ez.wireless.cellphone.capstone.jwt

Class JwtTokenUtil

java.lang.Object
com.ez.wireless.cellphone.capstone.jwt.JwtTokenUtil
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
@Component
public class JwtTokenUtil
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
The JwtTokenUtil is responsible for performing JWT operations like creation and validation. It makes use of the io.jsonwebtoken.Jwts for achieving this. Referenced from this guide: https://www.javainuse.com/spring/boot-jwt
See Also:
